No doubt someone @TheBotanics thinks the 11th hour announcement of Inverleith House closure is masterly news management. It's shameful.
@InverleithHouse You mean "before the gallery closes for ever", so why so secretive?
Not good enough to hear on Wednesday that one of the capital city's cultural gems is closing on Sunday @TheBotanics @InverleithHouse
No word of #inverleithhouse closure on @TheBotanics website. Late announcement seems designed to close off discussion/alternatives.
@LauraCummingArt called Inverleith House "the most beautiful gallery in Edinburgh – if not Britain". It's closing: https://t.co/c5ycFOQnIs
